MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH6 postcode area of Bagillt, affecting properties in Gadlys Lane, Nant Y Glyn, Highfield Road, Sandy Lane, Allt Celyn and the surrounding area. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 10:30 am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because further investigations are required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:31 pm on 6th April, 2021.
